landing.trust.title: Advanced conversational AI to automate sales, support, and follow-up.
landing.trust.subtitle: Official integration with the Meta API (WhatsApp, Instagram and Facebook). Aamy sends advanced intent and conversion events to Meta Ads (CAPI) to optimize campaigns in real time.
landing.capabilities.title: What Aamy does so you don‚Äôt lose customers
landing.capabilities.subtitle: Meet the AI system that understands context, detects intent, follows up, and turns conversations into sales.
landing.how.title: Fast setup in 3 steps
landing.how.subtitle: We tailor it to your business so you can reply, capture leads, and follow up from day one.
landing.results.title: Typical results
landing.results.subtitle: When you automate replies + follow-up, you recover leads that used to be lost due to slow response times.
landing.compare.title: Comparison vs. other solutions
landing.compare.subtitle: Aamy is built for real sales: context, intent, follow-up, booking, and ad optimization directly from conversations.
landing.compare.note: * ‚ÄúPartial/Depends‚Äù means it requires integrations, manual flows, or external tools.
landing.testimonials.title: What our customers say
landing.final.title: Ready to automate sales with advanced AI?
landing.final.subtitle: We set it up for your business so you can reply 24/7, capture leads, and follow up from WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook.
landing.final.tip: Tip: one recovered customer per month often pays for the service.
hero.h1.before: Automate and scale your sales with
hero.subtitle: Aamy automates conversations across WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook using advanced AI: it understands context, identifies buying intent, and runs strategic follow-up to maximize conversions.
hero.bullets.omni.title: Real omnichannel
hero.bullets.omni.desc: WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook in one system.
hero.bullets.pixel.title: Pixel + CAPI
hero.bullets.pixel.desc: Events from chats to optimize campaigns.
hero.bullets.booking.title: Booking
hero.bullets.booking.desc: Connect Google Calendar to confirm real appointments.
hero.bullets.intent.title: Intent-driven AI
hero.micro: Powered by conversational AI, Aamy replies using verified business info and chat context. You stay in control at all times.
hero.note: Guided setup with your info. Cancel anytime.
benefits.title: What does your business gain with
benefits.subtitle: Aamy doesn‚Äôt just reply fast. It uses advanced AI to understand context, detect intent, book appointments, and optimize your Meta campaigns.
benefits.cards.1.title: AI that understands context and intent
benefits.cards.1.desc: Aamy doesn‚Äôt give generic replies. It interprets customer intent, keeps the conversation thread, and answers accurately using your business info.
benefits.cards.2.title: WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook in one place
benefits.cards.2.desc: One inbox for all your messages. Reply faster and avoid losing customers across scattered channels.
benefits.cards.3.title: Automated sales with smart follow-up
benefits.cards.3.desc: If the customer cools off, Aamy sends strategic reminders based on detected intent. More closes with less effort.
benefits.cards.4.title: Ad optimization with Pixel + CAPI
benefits.cards.4.desc: Send advanced events from WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook to improve targeting and lower your cost per lead.
benefits.cards.5.title: Automatic booking with Google Calendar
benefits.cards.5.desc: Aamy offers time slots, checks availability in real time, and confirms real appointments directly on your calendar.
benefits.cards.6.title: Automatic multilingual
benefits.cards.6.desc: Your customers speak their language. So does Aamy. It detects Spanish or English and replies automatically to maximize conversions.
benefits.closing.after: Aamy helps you close more sales without working more.
dashprev.subtitle: Aamy isn‚Äôt just ‚Äú24/7 support.‚Äù It‚Äôs an AI system that centralizes channels, detects buying intent, automates follow-up, sends Meta Pixel/CAPI events to improve your ads, and shows metrics to boost conversions and campaign performance.
dashprev.bullets.1.title: Omnichannel history
dashprev.bullets.1.desc: WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook in one view, with conversations organized by customer.
dashprev.bullets.2.title: Buying intent detected
dashprev.bullets.2.desc: Identify cold, warm, and hot leads to prioritize closing (no guessing).
dashprev.bullets.3.title: Automatic follow-up
dashprev.bullets.3.desc: Scheduled follow-ups based on context and intent: recover sales that would‚Äôve been lost.
dashprev.bullets.4.title: KPIs and performance
dashprev.bullets.4.desc: Measure conversations, intent, peak hours, and results. Optimize with data, not assumptions.
dashprev.bullets.5.title: Meta Pixel + CAPI events
dashprev.bullets.5.desc: Log events from chat to improve targeting and lower your cost per lead in campaigns.
dashprev.mock.alt: Aamy dashboard preview: conversations, intent, follow-up, and KPIs
dashprev.closing: Guided setup with your info. You control everything; Aamy executes.
whofor.title: Who is
whofor.subtitle.before: For businesses that receive messages every day and want to
whofor.subtitle.after: without being glued to the phone. Aamy replies 24/7 on WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook, and automates follow-up when customers go cold.
whofor.advanced.1.title: Context + intent
whofor.advanced.1.desc: Aamy understands what the customer actually wants and replies with a conversion-first approach.
whofor.advanced.2.title: Automatic bilingual
whofor.advanced.2.desc: Detects the customer‚Äôs language and replies in Spanish or English‚Äîno extra setup.
whofor.advanced.3.title: Booking
whofor.advanced.3.desc: Connect Google Calendar to offer time slots and confirm real appointments.
whofor.advanced.4.title: More profitable ads
whofor.advanced.4.desc: Pixel + CAPI from conversations to optimize campaigns with real data.
whofor.fit.good.title: Ideal if‚Ä¶
whofor.fit.good.1: People ask about pricing, hours, location, availability, and promos.
whofor.fit.good.2: You lose customers because replies are late or outside business hours.
whofor.fit.good.4: You want to measure intent and results (not just reply).
whofor.fit.bad.title: Not the best fit if‚Ä¶
whofor.fit.bad.1: Your process requires long technical quotes and internal approvals for every case.
whofor.fit.bad.2: You don‚Äôt want to upload basic business info (services, FAQs, hours, policies).
whofor.fit.bad.3: You want a system with zero control‚ÄîAamy automates, but you can always jump in.
whofor.targets.1.title: Local businesses
whofor.targets.1.desc: Beauty salons, clinics, barbershops, tattoo studios, practices, and more.
whofor.targets.2.title: E-commerce & DM sales
whofor.targets.2.desc: Online stores and businesses that sell via WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook.
whofor.targets.3.title: Fitness & education
whofor.targets.3.desc: Gyms, indoor cycling, yoga, courses, workshops, and schools.
footer.tagline: Aamy.ai ‚Äî Omnichannel conversational AI for sales, booking and follow-up.
footer.disclaimer: Aamy processes messages using the information configured by each business and the rules of its industry. Results may vary depending on configuration, business type and message volume.
demoWa.title: How Aamy replies when a customer messages you
demoWa.subtitle: Instant replies and automatic follow-up without you being on your phone
demoWa.msg.1: Hi, can you give me some information?
demoWa.msg.2: Hi üëã I‚Äôm Amy, the business assistant. Happy to help. What information would you like to know?
demoWa.msg.3: I wanted to know the price
demoWa.msg.4: Sure üòä The price depends on the service you‚Äôre interested in. I can explain the available options.
demoWa.msg.5: If you tell me what you‚Äôre looking for, I‚Äôll give you the right information.
waDemo.initialText: Hi, I want to see how it works
cap.1.title: Conversational AI with context
cap.1.desc: Aamy understands intent and keeps the conversation thread to reply like a human (not just FAQs).
cap.2.title: Instant replies 24/7
cap.2.desc: Replies in seconds and reduces lead loss after hours without hiring extra staff.
cap.3.title: Automatic multilingual
cap.3.desc: Automatic language detection: Aamy recognizes whether the customer writes in Spanish or English and adapts instantly.
cap.4.title: Buying intent + sales
cap.4.desc: Identifies interest (low/medium/high) and replies with a closing-focused approach, collecting lead details.
cap.5.title: Automatic follow-up
cap.5.desc: If the customer stops replying, Aamy follows up intelligently to recover the sale.
cap.6.title: Google Calendar booking
cap.6.desc: Offers time slots, checks availability, and confirms real appointments on your calendar (ideal for services).
cap.7.title: Meta Pixel + CAPI
cap.7.desc: Sends advanced events from conversations (WA/IG/FB) to optimize campaigns and lower cost per lead.

landing.steps.2.desc: WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook connected to reply from one system.

landing.steps.3.desc: Buying intent, automatic follow-up, and Pixel/CAPI events to improve ads.

trainingHelp.training.note.prefix: This help is based on your current flow:
trainingHelp.training.note.suffix: and Preview. Use shortcuts to jump to each section.
trainingHelp.common.writingTips.1: Be specific about what the assistant must do (sell, book, segment, etc.).
trainingHelp.common.writingTips.2: Paste key info as plain text. Avoid dash bullet lists.
trainingHelp.common.writingTips.3: Don‚Äôt say ‚Äúsee more on our website‚Äù: the assistant can‚Äôt browse external links.
trainingHelp.common.writingTips.4: Include prices, schedules, location, policies, and active promos.
trainingHelp.common.faqTips.1: Write questions the way a customer would (e.g., ‚ÄúHow much does it cost?‚Äù).
trainingHelp.common.faqTips.2: Answer fully and kindly; avoid ‚Äúit depends‚Äù or ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù.
trainingHelp.common.template:
Services and pricing: ...
Location: ...
Hours: ...
Policies: ...
Active promos: ...
Internal/payment links: ...
trainingHelp.cta.explanation.1: Configure CTAs (text + URL) by intent so the assistant suggests the right action when that intent is detected.
trainingHelp.cta.explanation.2: If there‚Äôs no CTA for the detected intent, the ‚Äúglobal‚Äù CTA is used as a fallback.
trainingHelp.cta.explanation.3: The URL must start with http:// or https:// to be valid.
trainingHelp.cta.explanation.4: Recommendation: use short URLs and direct action pages (checkout, booking, confirm, map).
trainingHelp.cta.explanation.5: Tip: ‚Äúglobal‚Äù works as the default CTA when the customer intent doesn‚Äôt match a more specific one.
trainingHelp.cta.template:
Intent: global
CTA text: Start today in 1 minute
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/start

Intent: price
CTA text: See plans and pricing
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/pricing

Intent: hours
CTA text: See available hours
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/hours

Intent: location
CTA text: Get directions (Google Maps)
CTA URL: https://maps.google.com/?q=Your+Business

Intent: book
CTA text: Book my class now
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/book

Intent: buy
CTA text: Buy my plan
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/checkout

Intent: confirm
CTA text: Confirm my attendance
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/confirm

Intent: class_interest
CTA text: See beginner classes
CTA URL: https://yoursite.com/get-started
trainingHelp.cta.examplesFitness:
Scenario: Customer asks "How much does it cost?"
‚Üí Detected intent: price
‚Üí Suggested CTA: "See plans and pricing" ‚Üí https://synergyzone.fit/pricing

Scenario: "Where are you located?"
‚Üí Intent: location
‚Üí CTA: "Get directions (Google Maps)" ‚Üí https://maps.google.com/?q=Synergy+Zone

Scenario: "I want to book for tomorrow"
‚Üí Intent: book
‚Üí CTA: "Book my class now" ‚Üí https://synergyzone.fit/book
trainingHelp.cta.examplesBeauty:
Scenario: "How much are eyebrows?"
‚Üí Intent: price
‚Üí CTA: "See eyebrow & lash pricing" ‚Üí https://andreacastrobeauty.com/pricing

Scenario: "Do you have availability today?"
‚Üí Intent: hours
‚Üí CTA: "See available hours" ‚Üí https://andreacastrobeauty.com/book

Scenario: "Where are you?"
‚Üí Intent: location
‚Üí CTA: "Get directions (Google Maps)" ‚Üí https://maps.google.com/?q=Andrea+Castro+Beauty
trainingHelp.sections.training.ctaByInte: Go to the ‚ÄúCTA by intent‚Äù section.
trainingHelp.sections.training.commonMis: Bullet-format info that gets skipped by the generator.
trainingHelp.sections.meta.quickSteps.2: Fill business info and welcome message.
trainingHelp.sections.meta.quickSteps.3: Add FAQs and Intents for the ‚Äúmeta‚Äù channel.
trainingHelp.sections.meta.faqsAndIntent: Use real examples from your DMs.
trainingHelp.sections.voice.quickSteps.2: Define what it must achieve (book, qualify, charge, etc.).
trainingHelp.sections.voice.quickSteps.4: Add Hints (common phrases separated by commas).
trainingHelp.sections.voice.bestPractice: In Hints, use short, common phrases (e.g., ‚ÄúI want to book, class price, address‚Äù).
trainingHelp.sections.campaignSms.quickS: Write the SMS content (you can include a link).
Schedule the send date and time.
trainingHelp.sections.campaignSms.tips.1: Be short and clear; include a call to action.
trainingHelp.sections.campaignEmail.quic: Write Subject and Message; add an image if you want.
